item.name: getAccountUserList (특정 IBM AccountId를 사용하는 모든 사용자 조회)
getAccountUserList (특정 AWS AccountId를 사용하는 모든 사용자 조회)
특정 시간 이후의 IBM 티켓 목록
특정 티켓 번호 범위 내의 IBM 티켓 목록
CSP에서 생성된 티켓 등록 여부 확인
자동화 규칙 조회 - Ticket creation - 특정 규칙 상세 조회
자동화 규칙 조회 - Time triggers - 특정 규칙 상세 조회
자동화 규칙 조회 - Ticket updates - 규칙 상세 조회
티켓 동기화 추가 (동기화 목록에 티켓 id 추가)
티켓 동기화 중지 (동기화 목록에서 티켓 id 삭제)
여러 티켓 동기화 중지 (동기화 목록에서 티켓 id 삭제)
IBM AccountId를 사용하는 모든 사용자 조회
티켓 동기화 추가 (동기화 목록에 티켓 id 추가)
티켓 동기화 중지 (동기화 목록에서 티켓 id 삭제)

body.raw:
{ "schemaId": "Microsoft.Insights/activityLogs", "data": { "status": "Activated", "context": { "activityLog": { "channels": "Admin", "correlationId": "2138352e-3ec1-4ef2-971a-416afd10fbe4", "description": "Active: Upgrade your AKS cluster to a supported Kubernetes version", "eventSource": "ServiceHealth", "eventTimestamp": "2021-12-07T21:29:19.343794+00:00", "eventDataId": "9b9ad034-c898-bd31-e9d2-5a42d1f5ed13", "level": "Informational", "operationName": "Microsoft.ServiceHealth/actionrequired/action", "operationId": "2138352e-3ec1-4ef2-971a-416afd10fbe4", "properties": { "title": "Upgrade your AKS cluster to a supported Kubernetes version", "service": "Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)", "region": "Australia Central", "communication": "

You're receiving this notice because you are using Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).

\n

AKS is retiring v1.19.x on 31 January 2022. We've detected that one or more AKS clusters in your subscription(s) are using Kubernetes v1.19 or lower. To stay within supported versions and service-level agreements (SLA) you have up to 30 days after the version is removed to upgrade. To avoid ever falling out of support and to keep up with Kubernetes versions we recommend turning on auto-upgrade.

\n

Required action

\n

Please upgrade your clusters to 1.20 or higher by 31 January 2022.

\n

More information

  • To keep up to date with all AKS releases, subscribe the AKS Releases page.
  • To know when the next versions will be introduced or retired check the Kubernetes release calendar for AKS.

If you have questions, get answers from community experts in Microsoft Q&A.

If you have a support plan and you need technical help, please contact us.

", "incidentType": "ActionRequired", "trackingId": "DK6H-VPC", "impactStartTime": "2021-12-09T00:00:00.0000000Z", "impactedServices": "[{\"ImpactedRegions\":[{\"RegionName\":\"Australia Central\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Australia Central 2\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Australia East\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Australia Southeast\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Brazil South\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Brazil Southeast\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Canada Central\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Canada East\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Central India\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Central US\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Central US EUAP\"},{\"RegionName\":\"East Asia\"},{\"RegionName\":\"East US\"},{\"RegionName\":\"East US 2\"},{\"RegionName\":\"East US 2 EUAP\"},{\"RegionName\":\"France Central\"},{\"RegionName\":\"France South\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Germany North\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Germany West Central\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Japan East\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Japan West\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Jio India Central\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Jio India West\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Korea Central\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Korea South\"},{\"RegionName\":\"North Central US\"},{\"RegionName\":\"North Europe\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Norway East\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Norway West\"},{\"RegionName\":\"South Africa North\"},{\"RegionName\":\"South Central US\"},{\"RegionName\":\"South India\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Southeast Asia\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Sweden Central\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Sweden South\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Switzerland North\"},{\"RegionName\":\"Switzerland West\"},{\"RegionName\":\"UAE Central\"},{\"RegionName\":\"UAE North\"},{\"RegionName\":\"UK South\"},{\"RegionName\":\"UK West\"},{\"RegionName\":\"West Central US\"},{\"RegionName\":\"West Europe\"},{\"RegionName\":\"West India\"},{\"RegionName\":\"West US\"},{\"RegionName\":\"West US 2\"},{\"RegionName\":\"West US 3\"}],\"ServiceName\":\"Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)\"}]", "impactedServicesTableRows": "\r\nAzure Kubernetes Service (AKS)\r\nAustralia Central

\r\n\r\n", "defaultLanguageTitle": "Upgrade your AKS cluster to a supported Kubernetes version", "defaultLanguageContent": "

You're receiving this notice because you are using Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).

\n

AKS is retiring v1.19.x on 31 January 2022. We've detected that one or more AKS clusters in your subscription(s) are using Kubernetes v1.19 or lower. To stay within supported versions and service-level agreements (SLA) you have up to 30 days after the version is removed to upgrade. To avoid ever falling out of support and to keep up with Kubernetes versions we recommend turning on auto-upgrade.

\n

Required action

\n

Please upgrade your clusters to 1.20 or higher by 31 January 2022.

\n

More information

  • To keep up to date with all AKS releases, subscribe the AKS Releases page.
  • To know when the next versions will be introduced or retired check the Kubernetes release calendar for AKS.

If you have questions, get answers from community experts in Microsoft Q&A.

If you have a support plan and you need technical help, please contact us.

item.name: Azure - AccountId를 사용하는 모든 사용자 조회
